kv3.1:6.3: Taññeva tathāgatabalaṃ taṃ sāvakabalaṃ, taññeva sāvakabalaṃ taṃ tathāgatabalanti?
kv3.1:7.3: Yādisaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ tādisaṃ sāvakabalaṃ, yādisaṃ sāvakabalaṃ tādisaṃ tathāgatabalanti?
kv3.1:8.3: Yādiso tathāgatassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṃ dhammadesanā tādiso sāvakassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṃ dhammadesanāti?
kv3.1:9.3: Tathāgato jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv3.1:9.5: Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv3.1:10.3: Tathāgato anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
kv3.1:10.5: Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
kv3.1:12.3: Hañci sāvako ṭhānāṭhānaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:13.1: ☒ Sāvako atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ jānātīti?
kv3.1:13.3: Hañci sāvako atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:13.4: “atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
kv3.1:14.3: Hañci sāvako sabbatthagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:15.3: Hañci sāvako anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:15.4: “anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
kv3.1:16.3: Hañci sāvako sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:17.1: ☒ Sāvako jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ jānātīti?
kv3.1:17.3: Hañci sāvako jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:17.4: “jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇan”ti.
kv3.1:18.3: Hañci sāvako pubbenivāsānussatiṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:19.3: Hañci sāvako sattānaṃ cutūpapātaṃ jānāti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:20.1: ☒ Nanu tathāgatassāpi āsavā khīṇā sāvakassāpi āsavā khīṇāti?
kv3.1:20.3: Atthi kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayaṃ vimuttiyā vā vimuttīti?
kv3.1:20.5: Hañci natthi kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa vā sāvakassa vā āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayaṃ vimuttiyā vā vimutti, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.1:21.1: ☒ Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:22.1: ☒ Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:22.3: Sattānaṃ cutūpapāte yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:23.3: Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakaasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:24.1: ☒ Sattānaṃ cutūpapāte yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakaasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:24.3: Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakaasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:26.4: Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakaasādhāraṇanti?
kv3.1:28.1: ☒ Āsavānaṃ khaye yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇanti?
